name: Carnivorous Chicken
description:
Carnivorous Chicken

Created by Dark Elf Dungeon (Evelyn Moroyoqui) 

This is the first game I have ever made so it is exactly what you think it’ll be.

Keep the chicken away from the falling fruit, see how long you can last.

I used Unity and free assets from the Unity Asset store. 

I made Carnivorous Chicken in a night and I am pretty happy with it being my first game. 

This was great practice and I am ready to level up my development skills :)
